channel.title: Whonix-gateway on PC (not VM)
channel.description: How to install Whonix-gateway on PC (not VM) in a local network? What will be the settings of the Whonix-network between Gateway and Workstation (other PC-client in local net)? In fact, it will be an onion-gateway for individual or all PCs on the internal network. Probably there are problems with profiling all PCs connected to this gateway.

item.title: Whonix-gateway on PC (not VM)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 25 Jul 20

Build Documentation: Physical Isolation

Security by Isolation. Using Whonix ™ with Physical Isolation on Bare Metal for Better Security.
